name: The Tyrant of Fish
description:
In the traditional children's card game Go Fish, you collect sets of four and the first player to seven sets wins. In The Tyrant of Fish, you must lose Go Fish or you'll earn the wrath of a very sore loser.

Created for the March 2019 Cloudberry Jam on the theme 'the goal is to lose'. It was programmed in Delphi with RADstudio.
